snippet: First, we have to agree on precisely what constitutes a small business.
lead_paragraph: Last week, the House Small Business Committee met to examine the post-recession, small-business lending environment. Witnesses before the committee included representatives of credit unions, bankers, the Federal Reserve and private businesses involved in small-business lending and credit reporting. A summary of their testimony can be found in an interesting article by Kent Hoover.
abstract: First, we have to agree on precisely what constitutes a small business.

headline.main: Three Ways to Improve Small-Business Lending
